data.meta_description: Grave marker of my 3rd Great Uncle Samuel Layton He enlisted on 12 May 1864 as a private in Company A, 184th Regiment, Pennsylvania Infantry. His service was short. He was quickly sent to the Siege of Petersburg, Virginia. He was captured by Confederate troops on 22 Jun 1864 and died 4 months later in captivity at Camp Andersonville of scurvy on 18 Aug 1864.
